explanation: [0-0] Under a clear sky, on a flat and wide track, three racing cars and a motorcycle are parked on the left, a Red Bull F1 racing car is parked on the right, and a traffic light pattern is displayed above. Below the traffic light is the English caption "the ultimate drag race". The blue sky is dotted with clouds, and some green plants can be seen in the distance.
